Get pyGIMLi. Available for different platforms.

pyGIMLi has been successfully compiled on Windows, various Linux distributions and Mac OS X. See the installation section for more details on how to install or build pyGIMLi.

Get started. Check out the tutorials.

To get started, have a look at the pyGIMLi tutorials. Applications and user stories can be found in the Example section.

Get involved. We want your help.

You found a bug or desperately miss a certain functionality? Fill out a bug report or a feature request. If you have used pyGIMLi for an interesting application, consider sending us your example. Please cite the pyGIMLi paper or derived ones when using it for scientific purposes. {% endblock %}
